document_data.caption: A map showing Beastburn Lake in northern Dambrath.
document_data.name: Beastburn Lake
document_data.mainbody: '''Beastburn Lake''' was a small body of water found in northern [[Dambrath]].
document_data.Geography: Beastburn Lake sat at the halfway point between the [[Gnollwatch Mountains]] and the southern [[Lluirwood]] along the west to east stretch of the [[River Ammath]] where it flowed just north of the [[Hills of the Dead Kings]]. The only settlement of note on this small lake was [[North Post]] on its northwest shore.
